thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 117 of 7354
thread.title: Brian Daniel
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Brian Daniel

author: Brian Daniel
title: Brian Daniel
text:
I was tempted to order from Amazon and get my product a day earlier. But I decided to support an actual business with a storefront instead, as the prices were the same. (Just doing my part to support local economies.)
Anyway, my camera got in and I had missed a deal by two days. So I called them up and they were quick to help me. I was able to purchase the remainder of the package contents without any issue. I'm very happy to do business with this company. They will receive the bulk of my patronage from now on.
